Package managementserver

Interface IManagementServer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ManagementServer
    public interface IManagementServer
    Specifies the behavior of a management server that handles ICashRegisters.

    It allows to add and register ICashRegisters as well as remove them. In addition, the IProduct assortment of the management server can be accessed. However, the IProduct assortment will not be passed as a reference and only a copy can be accessed.

    Author:
    OOP

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • addCashRegister

        void addCashRegister​(ICashRegister cashRegister)
        Adds the passed ICashRegister to the management server. If the ICashRegister also implements the IObserver interface then it is also registered as an observer. In this case the ICashRegister is immediately notified about the current IProduct assortment via IObserver.notifyChange(ISubjectManagementServer).
        Parameters:
        cashRegister - The ICashRegister that should be added.

      • unregisterCashRegister

        void unregisterCashRegister​(ICashRegister cashRegister)
                     throws NotRegisteredException
        Removes the passed cash register from the management server. If the cash register is also registered as an IObserver, the notifications are deactivated (see IObserver.deactivateNotifications(ISubjectManagementServer) and it is removed from the observers.
        Parameters:
        cashRegister - the ICashRegister that should be removed
        Throws:
        NotRegisteredException - This exception is thrown if the passed ICashRegister is not registered at the IManagementServer

      • propagateProducts

        void propagateProducts()
        Notifies all IObservers about a change in the IProduct assortment via IObserver.notifyChange(ISubjectManagementServer).

      • retrieveProductSortiment

        ITree<IProduct> retrieveProductSortiment()
        Returns the current IProduct assortment from the IManagementServer. This method is a fall-back in case the IProduct assortment has to be retrieved from a class that is not an IObserver.

        Note: If the object implements the IObserver interface this method should not be used. The method ISubject.getChanges() should be used instead.

        Returns:
        ITree the IProduct assortment

      • retrieveRegisteredCashRegisters

        Collection<ICashRegister> retrieveRegisteredCashRegisters()
        Returns all currently registered ICashRegisters.
        Returns:
        all currently registered ICashRegisters.

      • retrieveRegisteredCashRegister

        ICashRegister retrieveRegisteredCashRegister​(Long cashRegisterId)
                                      throws NotRegisteredException
        Returns the ICashRegister where the id matches the id of the passed ICashRegister.
        Parameters:
        cashRegisterId - The id of ICashRegister that should be retrieved.
        Returns:
        ICashRegister if found.
        Throws:
        NotRegisteredException - thrown if no ICashRegister can be found with the passed id.
